advert.title: Want to learn more?
advert.description: Campaigns are a great way to organize your community around a specific topic. You can use campaigns to educate your community about a topic, to promote a specific action, or to track progress towards a goal. You can also use campaigns to organize events, like a community solar workshop or a home energy assessment day. You can even use campaigns to raise money for a specific project. The possibilities are endless!

deals.title: 30% Federal Investment Tax Credit
deals.description: Our government is thanking you for your investment to reduce greenhouse gas emissions! If you own your system, the Federal Investment Tax Credit (ITC) provides a credit for 30% of your total system costs. So come tax time, calculate what you owe and subtract 30% of the cost of your solar system from your federal tax bill. Donâ€™t worry, if you owe less in taxes than the 30% of your system cost, you can carry over those credits to the following years.
